Define.Name: P_RESULTS_PARSER_TEMPLATE
Define.Description: The section of the test output to look for the result(s) within.

Define.Name: P_RESULTS_PARSER_RESULT_KEY
Define.Description: The key to look for when parsing the OutputTemplate to find where the result should be stored. If this tag is not implemented, the default key will be used.

Define.Name: P_RESULTS_PARSER_LINE_HINT
Define.Description: A unique string to search the test result output for to indicate this is the line that contains the result value.

Define.Name: P_RESULTS_PARSER_LINE_BEFORE_HINT
Define.Description: The LineBeforeHint tag is similar to LineHint but is used to indicate the line before where the test results appear, in the event the LineHint tag cannot be used reliably.

Define.Name: P_RESULTS_PARSER_STRIP_FROM_RESULT
Define.Description: Any string that should be searched for and removed from the result value anywhere within the value string.

Define.Name: P_RESULTS_PARSER_STRIP_RESULT_POSTFIX
Define.Description: This is similar to the StripFromResult tag but will only look at the end of the value string for this string to be removed. (I.e. if a unit such as 'ms' or 'FPS' is appended to the result by the test without a space.)

Define.Name: P_RESULTS_PARSER_DIVIDE_BY
Define.Description: If the result value should be divided by some constant (to convert the result to a different unit), the value should be supplied in this tag.
